message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not giving up too much yet.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle?
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't expect me to go easy on you.
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll give you most of it, but I need something in return.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm not getting any younger, and I need to get my share.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll give you most of it, but I need something for my efforts.
You're getting close to nothing, Alice. I'm not going to go easy on you now.
I'm almost out of options. I'll give you most of it, but I need something for my efforts.
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
